revised_title: The Discovery and Function of Peroxisomes in Cells
tldr: The author discusses the discovery and properties of peroxisomes, a type of cytoplasmic organelle characterized by the presence of oxidases and catalase. They are found in various organisms, including plants and animals, and play a role in hydrogen peroxide metabolism. The author also examines the morphological and biochemical properties of peroxisomes, as well as their synthesis and turnover within cells.
